name: Mary
message: Jonathan, thank you so much.
Now I've made up my mind.

name: Jonathan
message: Made up your mind？
What do you mean?

name: Mary
message: No, it's fine now.
You'd better go quickly.

name: Jonathan
message: Well then, let's go together.
Staying here alone is just waiting for death.

name: Mary
message: そうはいかないわ。
ここはあたしのお店ですからね。

name: Mary
message: I don't just go out for no reason, you know.

name: Jonathan
message: No way...

name: Mary
message: Just go already！
You still have things you gotta do, don't you！

name: Mary
message: At least you should get out of this village safely.
You can't die in a place like this.

name: Mary
message: Jonathan, thank you so much.
Now I've made up my mind.

name: Jonathan
message: Made up your mind？
What do you mean?

name: Mary
message: Nah, it's fine now.
You should get going soon.

name: Jonathan
message: Then, let's go together.
Staying　here　alone　is　just　like　waiting　to　die.

name: Mary
message: I can't let you do that.
This is my shop, after all.

name: Mary
message: I'm not going to just leave so easily.

name: Jonathan
message: That's ridiculous...

name: Mary
message: Just go already！
You've still got things you need to do, don't you！

name: Mary
message: At least you, please get out of this village safely.
You can't die in a place like this.

name: Madam
message: Ah, you are......
There’s no sign of the two young prostitutes inside the Brothel.
Madam, left alone in the shop, looks at me with a face of relief, like she's seen a savior.

name: Madam
message: Ah, please... help me！
How　did　things　end　up　like　this？
What the hell happened？

name: Mary
message: ジョナサン、何をしに来たの。
Don't you know what's happening in this village right now？
Mary's face is pale, and the smile floating at her lips is somehow unnatural, like her mind is confused.

name: Jonathan
message: What happened here?
Where did Sue and Mabel go?

name: Mary
message: Sue...... Mabel......

name: Mary
message: You two are......
やや個性的に思える感を別にすれば、ロンドンでも中の下あたりに位置するホテルの一室と言っても通用するような瀟洒な内装だ。
今まで娼館などという場所に出入りした経験はないが、どこでもこんな様子なのだろうか。
Mixed in with the strong perfume that fills the room, there's also a nasty stench that makes you feel sick.
Every time I go out to cover incidents in the streets of London, there’s that familiar smell... This has gotta be the stench of blood, no doubt about it.
なかなか洒落た飾りが施してある。
Maybe the fact that they pay attention to such little details is proof that they're serious about their business.
It probably isn't easy to set up a store this big in Arkham, so maybe the lady owner here is actually pretty sharp.
Compared to places like Fish Scale Inn and Gilman House, they seem to be more proactive about investing in their facilities.
That just means there's that much profit in it.

name: Mary
message: Hurry up and go already.
You can't die in a place like this.

name: Jonathan
message: スウとメーベルは何処に行ってしまったんです。
If　you　went　outside　at　a　time　like　this...

name: Madam
message: Well then……
You saw that, didn't you？
Could that be... are you talking about a Deep One?
So then, that monster showed up at the brothel too, huh.

name: Jonathan
message: Then, Sue and Mabel...

name: Madam
message: It happened last night.
Two customers came, young fishermen.

name: Madam
message: As soon as they came in, they said stuff like 'today's our last time'... I just thought, oh, I guess these guys will be out fishing for a while starting tomorrow.

name: Madam
message: Not a lot of them come back to the port for about a week after they take their boat out.

name: Madam
message: But still...

name: Jonathan
message: What happened?
Those fishermen...

name: Madam
message: I woke up in the middle of the night to Sue and Mabel's screams.
I wondered what the hell was going on, and peeked into the room...

name: Jonathan
message: The guys had turned into fish monsters, right?
Sue and Mabel...

name: Madam
message: The whole place was a sea of blood around there！
They both got killed！

name: Jonathan
message: Calm down...

name: Madam
message: Ah... it's no good anymore...

name: Madam
message: It's my fault.
If I just hadn't let bastards like that into the shop...

name: Jonathan
message: Madam, hang in there.

name: Madam
message: It's Mary...

name: Jonathan
message: Mary？

name: Madam
message: That's my name.

name: Madam
message: Ah, Jonathan......
Please, just let me forget everything for just a little while！

name: Jonathan
message: What are you even saying at a time like this.

name: Madam
message: I'm about to go insane！
What the hell was that, this has to be a dream, yeah, that's got to be it...
No good, I'm not in a normal state of mind anymore.
It can't be helped, I'll do as you wish.......

name: Mary
message: What did you come here for？
Sue and Mabel aren't here either.

name: Mary
message: I'm already worn out.
あたしはここに残るから、あんた達だけでなんとかしてみ　　　　　　なさいよ。
Go outside
